mapper.select: SELECT id AS "id", name AS "name", remark AS "remark", type AS "type", value AS "value", fk_category_id AS "fk_category_id" FROM tb_data_dictionary WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT dd.id AS "id", dd.name AS "name", dd.remark AS "remark", dd.type AS "type", dd.value AS "value", dd.fk_category_id AS "fk_category_id" FROM tb_data_dictionary dd LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary_category dc ON dc.id = dd.fk_category_id WHERE dc.code = #{code}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_data_dictionary( name, remark, type, value, fk_category_id ) values ( #{entity.name}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.value}, #{entity.fk_category_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_data_dictionary SET name=#{entity.name}, remark=#{entity.remark}, type=#{entity.type}, value=#{entity.value}, fk_category_id=#{entity.fk_category_id} WHERE id = #{entity.id}
